channel.title: Stopping object Id's from always appearing?
channel.description:
Hey moparians(gtfo changing this to googlers i googled for 3 hours so stfu with googling)
I've been having a problem with Id's and coords always showing up when I click something, or any player for that matter.
[This is for project insanity - PI]
I've supplied a picture of the issue
Anyone got any ideas on how to stop this from showing up?
Any help would be appreciated, thanks.
Here's the pic.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/11m73pf.jpg[/img]

item.title: Stopping object Id's from always appearing?
item.dc:creator: @bestofpvm bestofpvm
item.description:
@bestofpvm wrote:

may i ask the name of the source you edited? ex: insidiax rsskills

Read full topic

item.title: Stopping object Id's from always appearing?
item.dc:creator: @blazkiller123 blazkiller123
item.description:
@blazkiller123 wrote:

yeah, that was actually the problem, it won’t bother me too much as if i ever do actually need to move objects, i’ll have the means to do so. mods and admins wont see the codes show in chatbox. Thanks alot for the help.

Matt.

Read full topic
item.source: Stopping object Id's from always appearing?

item.title: Stopping object Id's from always appearing?
item.dc:creator: @bestofpvm bestofpvm
item.description:
@bestofpvm wrote:

in my experiences there has been [PI] servers with different kinds of names in commands and such could you please be more specific?
But nonetheless you could try making your character rights as an admin rather than a owner, because usually the owners would want those object ids to help them code custom areas.

Read full topic
